Posts.Content: I would definitely get a second opinion but most likely you don't have anything to worry about.
Posts.Title: Freaking out!

Posts.Content: I've been diagnosed with stage 4 her2/neu protein positive breast cancer and am scheduled to start Herceptin on Monday.  I read a book on it and seemed like about 40% of the people survived.  Anyone out there with info on this type of cancer and Herceptin?  Let me know if you are doing this treatment if you are doing it with chemo and if so, what type of chemo.
Posts.Title: HER2/Neu protein positive breast cancer
